Description:
Provide essential services such as food, water, and waste disposal.
Hire and train camp staff.
Ensure that the camp complies with all relevant regulations.
Prepare reports on camp activity, costs, performance, and compliance with regulations.Skills
Skills:
High school diploma or equivalent.
5+ years of experience in camp management or a related field.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
Strong organizational and problem-solving skills.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
First aid and CPR certification.
